sentences.en: Average life expectancy went down from about 70 to 67.
sentences.cn: 平均预期寿命从70岁左右降到了67岁。

sentences.en: Captain tell you the life expectancy for pilots around here?
sentences.cn: 上校告诉你们飞行员的平均寿命有多长 吗 ?

sentences.en: I saw the look of expectancy in the children’s eyes.
sentences.cn: 我从孩子们的眼神中看到了期盼。

sentences.en: Longevity: In normal use, the expectancy greater than 500 times.
sentences.cn: 长寿命: 在正常使用情况下, 寿命大于500次.

sentences.en: Overall life expectancy, the general life of bellows valve in 3 years.
sentences.cn: 从总体寿命上, 一般波纹管截止阀使用寿命在3年以上.

sentences.en: Particularly cigarette smoking is associated with a shortened life expectancy.
sentences.cn: 尤其是吸卷烟会缩短人的概率寿命.

sentences.en: Pollution shortens considerably the life expectancy of a body of water.
sentences.cn: 污染使水体的估计寿命大为缩短.

sentences.en: She go to meet him with an air of expectancy.
sentences.cn: 她去见他时带著有所期待的神情.

sentences.en: The atomosphere of tense expectancy sobered everyone.
sentences.cn: 这种期望的紧张气氛使每个人变得严肃起来.

sentences.en: The life expectancy will be ninety to one hundred years.
The patients'biochemical response to ursodeoxycholic acid means a normal life expectancy.
sentences.cn: 患者对熊去氧胆酸产生生化上的反应意味着正常的寿命预期.

sentences.en: There was an air of expectancy among the waiting crowd.
sentences.cn: 等待的人群有一种期盼的心情。

sentences.en: Three of the six have comfortably exceeded their normal life expectancy.
sentences.cn: 6人中已经有3人轻松超过了正常的预期寿命。

sentences.en: Two days later, toward noon, Sandy began to show signs of excitement and feverish expectancy.
sentences.cn: 两天以后, 在快到晌午的时候, 桑弟忽然兴奋起来,心焦面热,好象有所期待似的.
我们因期待而神经紧张起来.

words.tran_cn: 期待的；怀孕的；预期中的

trans.tran_en: the feeling that something pleasant or exciting is going to happen
